name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace Arrives at Banaro Island
keyMoments.description: Ace finally tracks down Blackbeard to Banaro Island to confront him about murdering Thatch.
keyMoments.significance: This arrival triggers the Duel on Banaro Island, which will change the course of the entire series.

keyMoments.title: Ace Reveals Luffy is His Brother
keyMoments.description: Ace reveals to Blackbeard that Luffy is his younger brother and declares he won't let Blackbeard harm him.
keyMoments.significance: Connects Ace's protective instincts to the main storyline and shows his fierce loyalty to family.
keyMoments.quote: I won't let you kill my younger brother!

keyMoments.title: Ace Refuses to Join Blackbeard
keyMoments.description: Ace defiantly refuses Blackbeard's final offer to join his crew, declaring his loyalty to Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ace's unwavering loyalty and sets up his ultimate fate.
keyMoments.quote: I will make Whitebeard the King of the Pirates, or die trying!

keyMoments.title: Ace Unleashes Dai Enkai: Entei
keyMoments.description: Ace summons his ultimate technique, creating a massive fireball resembling the sun.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the full extent of Ace's Mera Mera no Mi powers.

abilities.description: Fire Fist - A massive wave of fire that devastates opponents.
Firefly Light - Fire attacks that cannot pass through Blackbeard's darkness.
Sacred Fire: Mysterious Light - Fire lances launched at the opponent.
Cross Fire - Cross-shaped flames attacking from multiple angles.
Great Flame Commandment: Flame Emperor - Ace's ultimate technique, creating a massive fireball resembling the sun.

relationships.description: Ace is Luffy's adoptive older brother and is fiercely protective of him.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace reveals to Blackbeard that Luffy is his brother and refuses to let Blackbeard harm him.

relationships.description: Ace hunts Blackbeard to avenge Thatch's murder and protect Luffy.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace confronts Blackbeard on Banaro Island, leading to their fateful duel.

relationships.description: Ace pursues Blackbeard to avenge Thatch, the murdered 4th Division Commander.

reveals.information: Multiple advanced Mera Mera no Mi techniques including his ultimate attack Dai Enkai: Entei

name.japanese: マーシャル・D・ティーチ

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Confesses to Murdering Thatch
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard admits he murdered Thatch to obtain the Yami Yami no Mi that he had been seeking for decades.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms Blackbeard's betrayal and establishes him as a villain willing to kill his own crewmates for power.
keyMoments.quote: I had no choice but to kill Thatch in order to obtain the Yami Yami no Mi. It's a Devil Fruit I've been chasing after for decades.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Yami Yami no Mi Powers
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard reveals his Devil Fruit's devastating ability to absorb all matter and energy like a black hole.
keyMoments.significance: First major display of the most evil Devil Fruit's power.
keyMoments.quote: This is the power of darkness! Everything is absorbed into the void!

keyMoments.title: Reveals Devil Fruit Nullification
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard explains that his Yami Yami no Mi can nullify other Devil Fruit powers upon contact.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes a game-changing ability that makes Blackbeard a unique threat to all Devil Fruit users.
keyMoments.quote: My Devil Fruit nullifies other powers upon contact. Your flames are useless against me!

abilities.description: Creates a gravitational vortex of darkness that pulls everything into its center and destroys it.
Releases everything the darkness has absorbed, sending debris and matter flying outward.
Upon physical contact, nullifies other Devil Fruit users' powers, reducing them to ordinary humans.

relationships.description: Blackbeard battles Ace on Banaro Island, ultimately defeating and capturing him.

evolutionMoments.description: Blackbeard and Ace engage in their fateful duel on Banaro Island.

relationships.description: Blackbeard murdered Thatch to steal the Yami Yami no Mi.

reveals.information: Murdered Thatch to obtain the Yami Yami no Mi
Yami Yami no Mi can nullify other Devil Fruit powers upon contact
Plans to kill Luffy and present him to the World Government
Spent decades searching specifically for the Yami Yami no Mi

keyMoments.title: Thatch's Murder Revealed
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard reveals that he murdered Thatch to steal the Yami Yami no Mi that Thatch had found.
keyMoments.significance: This murder sets the entire chain of events in motion, leading to the Banaro Island duel and eventually the Marineford War.

relationships.description: Thatch was murdered by Blackbeard to steal the Yami Yami no Mi he had found.

reveals.information: Murdered by Blackbeard for the Yami Yami no Mi
Was the 4th Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates

keyMoments.title: Van Augur Attacks Ace
keyMoments.description: Van Augur shoots at Ace as the Blackbeard Pirates initiate the battle.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the opening salvo in the Duel on Banaro Island.

name.japanese: ジーザス・バージェス

keyMoments.title: Jesus Burgess Attacks Ace
keyMoments.description: Jesus Burgess hurls an entire building at Ace during the battle.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the raw power of Blackbeard's crew and their willingness to use extreme force.
